description: Defines data structures and a static repository for videos in the Android TV app, including a Video data class and VideosRepository object with sample video data categorized by genre.

classes.name: Video
classes.description: Data class representing a video item with properties such as id, title, category, thumbnailUrl, description, and videoUrl.

classes.name: VideosRepository
classes.description: Object providing a static list of categories and videos for each category, along with a method to filter videos by category.

methods.name: videosForCategory
methods.description: Filters and returns a list of videos belonging to the specified category.
